text: We present a new collection of training corpora for evaluation of language - independent named entity recognition systems .For the five languages included in this initial release , Basque , Dutch , English , Korean , and Spanish , we provide an analysis of the relative difficulty of the NER task for both the language in general , and as a supervised task using these corpora .

text: The train and test data consist of four columns separated by spaces .Each word has been put on a separate line and there is an empty line after each sentence .The first column contains the current word , the second a part - of - speech tag derived by the Brill tagger , the third a chunk tag generated by a chunker [ TKS00 ] and the fourth a corresponding clause tag extracted from the Penn Treebank .
